column4: i would like to compile a GTK project, but i have a problem including the right libraries. >>g++ -o ./Debug/gladetest ./Debug/main.o  "-L." "-L." "-L/usr/lib/"  -lgtkmm-2.4<< returns >>/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lgtkmm-2.4<<. But i am shure libgtkmm-2.4 is there, i can $locate it using search function. Any idea what is wrong?
make sure you have a file called libgtkmm-2.4.a (or .so)
you probably need something called libgtkmm-2.4-dev or similar
